data.title: 25 Best Offbeat movies
data.text:
A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

A woman dealing with inconsolable grief over the death of her partner gets another chance when he returns to earth as a ghost.

When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds his mundane Chicago life to be the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire existence, from his work to his love life to his death.

A recently orphaned young woman goes to live with eccentric relatives in Sussex, where she sets about improving their gloomy lives.

A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

When a childless couple--an ex-con and an ex-cop--decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

When an English cartographer must tell a Welsh village that their mountain is only a hill, the offended community sets out to change that.

Arnold rescued Thomas from a fire when he was a child. Thomas thinks of Arnold as a hero, while Arnold's son Victor resents his father's alcoholism, violence and abandonment of his family.

An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

Shirley is a 42-year-old bored Liverpudlian housewife who takes a holiday trip to Greece and meets a local man who bolsters her self-confidence. She evolves and transforms to the point that her husband doesn't even recognize her.

A company president gets framed with a food-poisoning scandal and the only person who can help him is the evening cleaning-woman, who always seems to be at the right place at the right time.

A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Charlie, a 15-year-old introvert, enters high school and is nervous about his new life. When he befriends his seniors, he learns to cope with his friend's suicide and his tumultuous past.
